channel.title: CVE Feed for Averta -- Phlox Shop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Averta -- Phlox Shop

item.title: CVE-2023-39163|2024-08-02T18:02:06.866Z -- averta -- phlox%20shop
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Averta Phlox Shop allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Phlox Shop: from n/a through 2.0.0.
